description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.wFTC0sGqdpnZUib4]{Gear Boost}

When you hit a creature within 30 feet of you while using a weapon with the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#bright]{Bright} weapon special property, the radiance partially blinds the target, giving it the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.YjE6UGzwOTfO9p4g]{Dazzled} condition for 1 round. If you hit multiple creatures at the same time (such as with an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#automatic]{Automatic}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#blast]{Blast}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#explode]{Explode} weapon), only the creature nearest to you or at the center of the explosion (your choice if multiple creatures are equidistant) is affected.
